website_summaries.verdict: If you need something affordable that doesn’t compromise on functionality, this duo is hard to beat. In terms of moisture and odor control, these come pretty close to pricier options.
pros: Sealed TPU construction is lightweight and quick drying, while effectively containing moisture
Dry pocket is ideal for extra diapers, wipes, or a change of clothes
Available in multiple colors and prints
cons: The zippers could be a little sturdier

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE - GROWS MOLD!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using two of these bags on a rotating basis for my pump parts for approximately 10 months. Unfortunately, despite laundering in a garment bag and hanging inside out to dry completely before each use, mold has started to grow near the seams at the bottom of the bag (see attached pictures). Despite the one year guarantee, the seller ultimately only offered me a negligible refund. I have a Bumkins wet bag used for the same duration and cleaned in the same way which still appears brand new. Would not recommend buying these bags if you are concerned about mold/mildew growth. I will replace these bags with another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps everything dry outside the bag
customer_reviews.text: I am using the bags for pumping supplies at work so I don't blow through a bunch of ziplock bags. They work great, keep all the moisture inside, and I love the 2nd pocket to separate dry things. My only complaint is about the zipper, the tab came off on the second use, I put it back on, and if I'm gentle with it, it'll stay on, but the zipper could be a little better.
customer_reviews.author: cw9113

customer_reviews.title: Yes, Yes & Yes!
customer_reviews.text: Nice big enough durable bags to put my baby items in. I use it to carry all the Items I need to change baby. I keep this bag in my diaperbag that way I can find everything easily and when we're dining out I don't have to carry my whole diaperbag to the restroom just this bag. Large enough to put in: more than 7 size 2 diapers, changing pad, normal size pack of wipes, diaper rash ointment, disposable diaper bags. And there would be enough space to put in my baby's dirty clothes if I need to change him. Each bag has 2 zippered compartments. Sooooo convenient. Every mom needs this!
customer_reviews.author: Soraya K

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: First time I tried to use it for my travel, for my pump parts... as I was walking with the bag I kept swinging it naturally and felt drops and drops. Didn’t think anything of it till I snapped reached for the bag and SURE enough. It was dripping the tiny bit of gathered water that was on the parts I just washed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C.

customer_reviews.title: Decent wet bags
customer_reviews.text: These are great bags - we use them for transporting dirty daycare clothes home, going to swim lessons, keeping extra clothes in diaper bag, etc. They dry quickly. If you have sopping wet items the bag will leak some but generally does a decent job of keeping the moisture in. One complaint is that the carry loops on my bags are different. One was a snap like pictured but the other was just an elastic loop that's smaller than the snap so a little harder to carry around the wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Minh N

customer_reviews.title: So many uses
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased a few sets over the last few years - they are great! When my daughter was an infant, I always had 2 in my diaper bag - one to hold dry clothes, and one in case of a blow out or spit up for the dirty clothes. I throw them right in the wash and never had an issue with quality, mold, etc. They've been washed probably a hundred times at this point and there is no fraying, fading, etc. Now that my kids are a little older, I keep these in the car or beach bag- great for damp suits or extra outfits.
customer_reviews.author: Smitten794

customer_reviews.title: Covid19 cloth toilet paper bags.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these bags due to the run on toilet paper when this COVID19 pandemic started. So since I had used cloth diapers with my youngest, I decided to make cloth toilet paper squares for just urine. This was perfect because I am the only girl and I was the biggest user. I loved that the bags were able to hold a lot of squares. The bags NEVER had a urine smell seep out. I put them in the wash with the squares and they came clean. PLU held up wonderfully. I would buy them again for just wet swimsuits. These are perfect for anything wet.
customer_reviews.author: JTeam

customer_reviews.title: Have lasted over 2 years!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for diaper bags, the pool, splash pads, on boats, at the beach, etc. I have had these for over 2 years now and I have found so many great uses for them. They are water resistance which means they protect your stuff and if you throw wet stuff in them it doesn’t get out. They just toss in the water and dryer to clean them and they have a snap handle to help you travel with them. I recommend them to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: MEmbick

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I use these to hold my bathing suits after the gym and they work perfectly. I also used it on vacation. I used the little pocket to carry things like sunscreen and hide cash. I easily fit 3 full bathing suits in the bigger pocket. They work great.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Great little bag, can fit a lot!
customer_reviews.text: Got these to use as wet bags for cloth diapers on-the-go and they work great. Love that each has 2 zippered pockets, so I can have diapers in one, and soiled clothes in another, yet still contained in one bag. Only complaint, they aren't air-tight, so you don't want to leave soiled things for too long, especially in a diaper bag. Stinky! I hang dry all my water-resistant items, even if they say they are safe for the dryer, so I cannot say how well they hold up against that, but with hang drying and more than 18 months of use, they still look almost new.
customer_reviews.author: NME

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags! Amazing quality, the colours and patterns are so beautiful and it works great! My daughter does swimming so every week I need something to hold all the wet stuff and this is amazing it’s a great size but still holds so much usually I can put her wet bathing suit plus two wet towels and wash cloths plus in the front pocket I can put her wet swim diaper if no bin is around at the time
customer_reviews.author: Cibele

customer_reviews.title: Stylish & versatile
customer_reviews.text: Love these, they are waterproof and easy to clean, and I love the cute design options. I will say they are a little thin compared to the Sarah Wells Pumparoo wet bag I also got. Not a problem for me, they are still durable and hold a lot. I use them to hold breast pump parts at work or dirty baby clothes if she makes a mess when we’re out. I’ve thrown them in the washing machine and dryer before, although I usually try to air-dry them to avoid damage to the plastic lining from too many times in the dryer. You could also just flip them inside out and hand wash them. Both pockets are waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Florinette

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy these for dirty diapers!
customer_reviews.text: So cute, but not well made at all. First thing I noticed was they let the odor out. My other wet bags do not have this problem. Next thing, when I washed them the wet goes right through the PUL and the seams!! Thank goodness I didn’t have a dirty diaper leak through. Going to go spend more $ at Planet wise.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M Forant

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality wet bag, great for travel
customer_reviews.text: So far, I have used these bags to transport pump parts to and from work and for storing wet baby swimsuits after going to the pool. The bag is very nice quality and having that extra compartment is a nice feature. I have thrown it in the washer, but most times just hand wash it using some soap and warm water. It also dries quickly. Super handy bag to have around!
customer_reviews.author: Zee

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these!
customer_reviews.text: My only regret is that I really don't need more than 2 bags because I want them all. The colors/patterns are adorable, they function great, and travel easily. I love the snap handle so I can hook one of the bags up to the changing table for convenience. The 2 pocket functions easily allows for me to store clean and dirty diapers (though I tend to stick with only using this for dirty).
customer_reviews.author: Brandon cheek

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Value!
customer_reviews.text: Great value! We used these for a cruise. All of our bathing suits and water shoes fit in one bag and that tucked nicely inside our backpack. Kept everything dry and sand-free. Don't hesitate to order, they work amazingly well!!
customer_reviews.author: JennyReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Works well for swimsuits
customer_reviews.text: These have worked well for adult swimsuits. I admit that the suits did get rinsed, wrung out and hung to drip overnight before putting them, albeit damp, in the bags. They have a pocket which I used for the swimsuit hangers I bought to drip dry in hotel showers. I'm not sure if they would hold up to full-on wet suits but okay for damp suits for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Toadcrystal

customer_reviews.title: Great for swimwear on road trips!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to store wet bathing suits on recent trip. They have a main pocket and a front pocket, slightly smaller. After use, we pulled everything out the next night and turned them inside out. The next morning everything was dry, so we repacked and headed to the next place, not working about soured swimsuits.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hamor

customer_reviews.title: Keeps smells and wetness contained.
customer_reviews.text: Feels soft and flexible. We keep this as a cloth diaper pail on our pack n play changing table. Washes well and dries quickly. Still looks brand new. Great that it has snaps making it easy to hang. Keeps thing touching it dry. Also use in the diaper bag. Contains wet and smelly cloth diapers. You wouldn't even know it was in there.
customer_reviews.author: Shops too much

customer_reviews.title: Used for "period panties".
customer_reviews.text: Sorta weird but I purchased these for my young daughter to place her washable period panties in (special underwear to be worn on period without pads/tampons). One bag stores her fresh, ready to wear panties. The other bag she knows to place panties that need washed. The bags have not leaked. I cannot smell any odor outside of the bag. Not sure if that'd be accurate for poo.
customer_reviews.author: j elder

customer_reviews.title: Would buy these again! And love using them!
customer_reviews.text: These were bought so i could use them for my older kiddos. I have used them for spare outfits, they will be great for gymnastics class dance cheer and everything inbetween to help keep us going the seperate designs and characters help keep the confusion to a minimum. It has held wet clothes and dried nicely and without smell. They are roomy and much bigger than i thought it held an outfit for my 9 year old. So these are a win in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha B

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Used these for a week and the little strap ripped of. Wouldn’t be too big if a deal but I cloth diaper and need these to hang in the laundry room until full. Can get about 4-5 pocket diapers in them. It was easy to order a set of replacements though. And they definitely lock in the smells
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Y

customer_reviews.title: useful but not water proof
customer_reviews.text: We used this for my son's camping but when I tested them and saw that it was not water proof and fabric did not have layering, I put plastic bag inside of them so he could throw his wet clothes in there. It is a bag, but if you throw a wet shirt in it, won't keep rest of your stuff safe.
customer_reviews.author: arcanax

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: These are great wet/dry bags. We use them on day adventures for our (cloth) diapers. We put a diaper or 2 in the dry pouch and a small package of wipes. The wet pouch holds any dirty diapers and keeps the wetness in. Easily replaces a diaper bag. Also good for wet bathing suits after swimming!
customer_reviews.author: A. Dion

customer_reviews.title: Love the little zip compartment for things like shower gels/face ...
customer_reviews.text: We used this for a camping trip while overseas and it works just as we wanted it to. It kept our dry clothes dry and the loop allowed us to hang it on the shower door. Love the little zip compartment for things like shower gels/face wash.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: A must have for pool or beach
customer_reviews.text: These were an impulse buy that turned into a must have. We go to swimming pool and beach regularly and usually just throw our wet suits in a plastic zipper bag which would then get thrown away- what a waste. With these bag I had no issue with leaking even with dripping wet suits fresh out of the water. I just turned the bag inside out and hung it to air dry and we had no problem with mildew or odor.
customer_reviews.author: Katie V.

customer_reviews.title: These bags are exceptionally good at trapping dirty diaper odors.
customer_reviews.text: These bags are exceptionally good at trapping dirty diaper odors. I accidentally forgot a poopy diaper in the diaper bag overnight after a doctor visit and I had no idea it was still there because I couldn't smell it. That alone exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: D H

customer_reviews.title: YES!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my pump parts when i'm at work. I absolutely love the print and how they're machine washable. I honestly, have no complaints whatsoever. I've never had an issue with leaks or tears and with multiple washes they look brand new (still). I bought these bags because I couldn't phantom to spend bookoo of money on JUJUBE dry bags. I will be purchasing more and will recommend this to my coworker who is having a baby soon.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for new moms
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean, I just wash with babies clothes and tumble dry low and haven’t had any problems. I always keep one in my diaper bag and one in the car. And since going back to work I also keep a set in my pumping bag, for my wet parts. You never know when you’ll need it
customer_reviews.author: Chaelyn

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these!
customer_reviews.text: These wet bags are excellent. They are large and don't leak at all. We had a big poop in public so I rinsed our diapers well and put it in the bag and had no leaks or wetness on the exterior of the bag. I also love that there are two zippers so I can put dry/wet things in one bag. Cute pattern also. If you're trying to decide on these, just get them, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Estelle Canon

customer_reviews.title: WAY better than I ever expected
customer_reviews.text: WAY better than I ever expected. I got the cars, and the pink trees. They are both wet and dry bags. They are of great size and quality! Very inexpensive for such great bags! The tree bag came in typical PUL material, and the outside of the cars bag was very soft and velvet like. I absolutely love them! Will definately buy more if ever need be.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: Leaked. Wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.text: One bag worked ok, the other one leaked the first time we used it.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the wet at bay
customer_reviews.text: We bought these bags for doing to the beach and going on cruises and they work wonderfully! The bags were perfect after going to the beach to put our wet bathing suits in. The bags are strong and cute too.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Perreault

customer_reviews.title: Saving the planet one beautiful bag at a time!
customer_reviews.text: Love these reusable, machine washable waterproof bags! Can’t get enough of them. Love the prints I like when the offer multiple prints in a two or three pack. In the three pack the larger size is most ideal...for my gym use clean clothes and towels...and then when I’m done put the dirty clothes and towels in them...the toss the contents into the washer along with the empty bag! Love love love these bags!!!
customer_reviews.author: Janice Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Keeping the wet stuff separate
customer_reviews.text: Theses were recommend to me to use for our swim suits after going to water fitness classes. I rinse out my suit, squeeze out as much water as I can and throw them in the bag. No problems with anything else getting wet. Once I get home- empty it out. I like to turn it inside out to dry. And then I'm ready to go the next day. They are so easy to use- can't imagine going to the pool without them.
customer_reviews.author: Denys Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Even more improved!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 2 of these for daycare. They fit 4 or 5 Bumgenius pocket diapers in them. I wound up buying 2 more to rotate in, and was pleasantly surprised to discover a new improvement--the snap loops! (Our first two just had elastic loops). We haven't had any issues at all with these bags. They're a great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Anne B

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and durable
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these and have bought multiple times over the past 3 years. I use these to store breast pump parts in the fridge. Saves me (and the planet) from using ziplock bags. I also have a few I use for wet swimming suits, dirty kids clothes, etc when on the go. I throw them in the washing machine and dry on low.
customer_reviews.author: AlwaysLearning

customer_reviews.title: Great to have on hand and great for beach trips!
customer_reviews.text: I use these wet bags in each of the two diaper bags to put our dirty cloth diapers in. They hold in the smell and the wetness from pee so well. I was very surprised. We love Alva products and buy nothing but Alva. I also use these bags when we go to the beach and want to put wet swim suits in for on the car ride home. All around, these bags are good to have on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleigh

customer_reviews.title: Kept my things dry on the outside
customer_reviews.text: These are great bags and they are spacious. I use them to hold my breast pump parts and the bags hold up. I've had a milk bag burst and bag held it's ground. I don't recommend it for soaking wet items but they're awesome if you need it to hold one bathing suit or similar items. I threw this bag with my child's suit and it did not leak onto the rest of the dry clothes in my other bag. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Kane-Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price point
customer_reviews.text: While I wouldn't say these are the best wet bags on the market (Planetwise is my FAVORITE), at this price point they are great. I bought these for a friend who is looking to cloth diaper and I love that these came in two packs. The colors and quality are nice and are as they were described. The one with the circles is really pretty but I like the simple blue as well. Wet bags are useful for many things (dirty laundry or diapers, packing day bags, use when traveling, with swim suits, storing items in car, etc). Can hold between 6-10 diapers each.
customer_reviews.author: MacPie

customer_reviews.title: Cute and dependable
customer_reviews.text: Love these wet/dry bags. They work really well at keeping the wet in. We are just now really getting into cloth diapering so this is the first wet/dry bags we ever purchased, but defintely feel we made the right choice. Will definitely need to buy more, but just need to decide if I want more little bags for convenience or get a big bag. But it will defintely be something from Alva.
customer_reviews.author: Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great Cloth Diaper Bag
customer_reviews.text: These have yet to leak anything out of them in my diaper bag or on the door next to the dirty clothes can. It holds in smells really well and it a fantastic find. The purple one does have a stretchy tie on the side whereas the zig-zag one is made of the same material, so we mostly use the purple to hold the diapers in diaper bag while we are out of our house because we don't want to over-stretch it on our door with our poopy diapers, but other than that, I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin D.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, no leaks!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase, I've gone back and bought a total of 6 of these now. We use for our dirty cloth diapers on the go with the baby, and they never leak. They're super easy to just dump out, turn inside out, and stick in the washing machine, too. Holding up super well, I'm very pleased. I will be using some of these bags to transport my breast pump parts when I go back to work, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: I cloth diaper my child so I sent this to his sitters to send back dirty clothes and diapers. I also use it for my pump stuff going to and from work! I have them all around the house for dirty napkins and in the bathroom for family cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Randi Harris

customer_reviews.title: Used for storage
customer_reviews.text: These were so cute when they arrived! I don’t have kids and needed a bag to pack all of my wool dryer balls and other natural laundry materials. They were the perfect size. I use the other bag to store my damp bathing suits when we go out. It neatly folds into my bag and I’m ready to go!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Preferred the Bumpkins Bags
customer_reviews.text: Tried to save a few bucks here after loving the Bumpkins bags, so I tried these. They are a bit thicker than the Bumpkins ones and I don't love them as much as the others. The outer pocket is nice though. If you're able to get the Bumpkins I would recommend those, but these will do if not. Leakproof and they get the job done, I just prefer the others.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Good zippers, and size, but the bags leak.
customer_reviews.text: They are a good medium size, material is the waterproof PUL, and the zippers are fantastic for one-handed opening. They leak though, because the inside edges, do not have a sealant or heat bonded waterproofing bias tape to cover them. Basically, the wetness comes through the holes that are created, during sewing. Thats a bummer, because I have to lay my bags flat (on the front pocket), instead of hanging or upright, to avoid leaking. These are ok for damp items, or a day trip out for cloth diapering, but not wet items like for swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie T.

customer_reviews.title: Yes! Great bag.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect as a wet/dry bag. We used this while on vacation at a water park. We stored our wet bathing suits in the bags after swimming. The bags kept our other items dry as it stored out wet items. Impressed- will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I wish they were a bit larger but other than that these bags are really nice. Despite being marketed as reusable diaper bags, I bough them as wet bags for my breastfeeding pump parts. The designs are unique. Stitching is adequate, and zippers all work well. I’ll probably buy more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Bek

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags! They’re super cute and well-constructed. The dual pockets are handy for carrying items separately. We primarily use these for cloth diapering and can fit 4-5 OS pocket diapers in each bag. We have also used them for wet swimsuits when going to the pool. I’d say they’re not 100% waterproof because my backpack got wet through the bag with our soaking swimsuits in there but was fine if we wrung them out really well so they weren’t dripping water.
customer_reviews.author: kanici21

customer_reviews.title: Great waterproof bags for cloth diapers or anything else!
customer_reviews.text: Love the product! Works exactly as it should. Keep moisture from clothies in and doesn’t hold onto smells. You can use a few times before washing. Keep it my purse even! Only complaint - 2 day shipping took 10 days. They shipped on the 9th day and it arrived the next day. Not sure why the issue/delay in shipping. Requested to cancel order but was denied and order shipped out next day. Either way, I love the product. Didn’t like the delay.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Nice for traveling or going to the beach
customer_reviews.text: Like the handy size! Also fits 2-3 kids suits in it! Gave the 2nd one to daughter for traveling with her children. Would purchase again. Nice price and heavy duty. I recommend washing on delicate cycle.
customer_reviews.author: NanaRita

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!!! Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I love the design of these...These are much larger than I thought they would be...I bought them to use as waterproof bags to place swimsuits in at the beach...They offer so much space in both pockets that I can even pack things like deodorant and cosmetics to use in the changing room...I absolutely love these bags...Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Reyan Taitt

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel, holds in the dirty diaper smell.
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect travel bags and I always keeps one in my diaper bag. They keep the dirty diaper odor contained and they never leak. I have had them for a few months and used them multiple times and they still have a great seal. The zipper tag has broken off on one but I still use it.
customer_reviews.author: chelsie papineau

customer_reviews.title: Good bags
customer_reviews.text: So far these bag work great for my cloth diapers. There is no stink when I used them for an extended weekend camping. They fit about 5-6 pocket diapers, or about 7-8 flats depending on how you stuff them in there. I did use one at the pool the other day and I would not do that again, I put my babies wet swim suit in the bag and the water was not contained in the bag, it leaked a decent amount on my car floor. I did give 4 stars because I would buy them again, I would just not use them for extra wet items again.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great for pumping parts!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags. I am pumping at work and this bag is wonderful for the parts after washing. I can just semi-dry my items and toss them in the bag and no leaks anywhere! I also like the size and multiple pockets. I wish I could wash them in the laundry, but if hand washing is the only down side then I don't have much to complain about.
customer_reviews.author: Midwest Mind

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: These were a better deal than the wet bags used for swim suits. I bought these as "goodie" bags for my daughter's birthday, with some goodies inside. I bought with intention of using for wet swimsuits, or towels, etc. Got 2 for price of 1, and cute colors and designs.
customer_reviews.author: Vonda

customer_reviews.title: No leaks , no smell
customer_reviews.text: these are great wet bags to have on hand for honestly anything you might need a wet bag for including cloth diapers. I have one in my car and several at home, in the go-bags etc. great to have laying around in case you need one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No smelly or soggy bag!
customer_reviews.text: I use these to hold my wet and dirty dish rags until I have enough to wash. What a difference these bags are compared to a regular plastic bag! No more Musty rags under my sink. Now I have this cute bag on a clip and couldn’t be happier. So many cute colors/patterns. The two pack is very affordable and very good quality. So happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Great short trip out bag!
customer_reviews.text: Cute prints, great quality and perfect size to throw in the diaper bag for a short trip out. It easily fits two to three cloth diapers in the smaller pocket and we leave the larger pocket empty to put soiled diapers/clothes into. I also really like that there’s a little handle so you could just take this wet bag with you if you didn’t want to bring a whole diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great for swimsuits!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for swimsuits or water shoes for my husband and I’s vacation. They were perfect for wet or dry items. I loved that the big pocket was water proof but the smaller pocket could be used for dry items or to store other things. Seem to be made durable.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Estridge

customer_reviews.title: ... - one for clean clothes the other to send dirty ones home in
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these bags to send to daycare with my infant son - one for clean clothes the other to send dirty ones home in. These are high quality, light weight, and easy to keep clean. I have machine washed and dried them as needed and they continue to look great. Our daycare provider even asked where they were purchased as other parents were asking (so much cuter than the mesh bags found at big box stores!). I'll be purchasing another set for my sister for her son.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought!
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected! I haven’t had the need to use them with wet clothes yet, so I can’t review on it’s water resistance. They are prettier and bigger than I thought which was a great surprise! The zipper is good quality and the material is nice too, not cheap looking at all. Great value for price.
customer_reviews.author: Edith P.

customer_reviews.title: Wish we had gotten sooner
customer_reviews.text: This has been helpful both with dirty clothes and wet clothes. Holds scent in well and we are able to clean and reuse it the next day after a cleaning. Wishing we'd thought to have this in our diaper bag earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Roberto

customer_reviews.title: Great product for more than just cloth diapering.
customer_reviews.text: We love these. We got them for potty training and have had several times where we have had to put pee covered clothes in it and I like the dry pocket to store some clean clothes.
customer_reviews.author: kaitlyn stowe

customer_reviews.title: Not 100% waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I think these would work well for diapers, but if you're looking for somewhere to toss your wet swimsuit, these are not the bags for you. Even well-wrung out suits still leak through the bag, which was disappointing. Also, buying these makes Amazon think you're pregnant/have a baby and the tailored ads get RIDICULOUS. I was just looking for a replacement for, like, a ziploc for my wet swimsuit in my gym bag. This is not that.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Anne

customer_reviews.title: Two pockets are great.
customer_reviews.text: A you tube video recommended wet bags with two pockets and they were right. I can put changing supplies in one pocket and dirty cloth diapers in the other and this is all I have to carry. Alternatively I put wet clothes in one pocket and wet diapers in the other. Two pockets are the way to go. Note, the zippers or not waterproof. This is not the type of wet bay you bring camping. It is not watertight.
customer_reviews.author: MAGGIE R

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great for pumping mom
customer_reviews.text: Good quality material, water resistant for the most part unless it's submerged in water. I used for putting my breastmilk pumping parts and bottles for work and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Candy Ng

customer_reviews.title: but they look awesome. I can’t wait to use them
customer_reviews.text: Just received these so I cannot speak to their longevity, but they look awesome. I can’t wait to use them. Got these for swim lessons for my daughter. They are nice and large. 2 separate pockets. One bag has an elastic handle and one has a snap closure. See pictures. Update: Used for swim lesson and worked perfectly! Kept the wet stuff separate. Will update after washing!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my swimming gear and it works great. The two compartments keep my dry/clean clothes absolutely dry without any leakage and the alvababy bag does not smell It’s easily rinsed and clean, hassle free. Bought extras for the rest of the family. My kids use it for camp and after about 6hrs, their backpacks are still dry
customer_reviews.author: Best Deal Finder

customer_reviews.title: Great bags, great price
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags! They’re a great size to hold 4-5 diapers, and I love that I can put the dry diapers in one pocket and the soiled in another. They wash well when needed, but the interior rinsed great so I rarely have to fully wash. No leaking, great seams, strong zipper that’s easy to pull. Colors are vibrant, the floral design is crisp. The unicorn design I wish was more crisp, it’s the slightest bit blurred in comparison
customer_reviews.author: brittney newcomb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect dirty diaper sack holder for diaper bag travel
customer_reviews.text: I use these in my diaper bag to put my dirty cloth diapers in while out. They work perfect for that. Small. I would not suggest getting these as your main diaper pail, too small. Other than putting his pee or poop soaked diapers in here, I have utilized it properly as a wet bag. But as a travel dirty diaper bag, it's perfect! (I bought it for)
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Pea

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price and quality
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality. They are cheap enough to buy several to use for daycare and on the go. I was worried they would be too small but they are just right for diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: litlmamarose

customer_reviews.title: So Useful!
customer_reviews.text: We cloth diaper, and these bags are a must. I have one for each weekday, and I put the dry diaper covers and inserts in the smaller zippered pouch of each bag ahead of time to make diaper changes super easy. Then the wet/soiled diapers go in the larger zippered pouch to keep them contained until we can get home and throw them in the wash.
customer_reviews.author: DJanss

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver with infant
customer_reviews.text: Appreciate there are two (we have four total) for my bag and my husband’s with our daughter. Keeps items separated and is washable itself, which is critical with an infant!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great products for pumping mothers on the go.
customer_reviews.text: I use these bags for my b. pump parts, they conveniently have two pockets. I use the large pocket for my pump parts and the smaller one for supplies to clean them. I rotate the two bags and just throw them in with my wash when they get dirty. They’re discreet, which is a plus, especially at work or on the go, I think way more stylish than carrying around milky parts in a large ziplock. They’re super durable and of course waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I love these wet/dry bags so far. The stitching started unravelling on one of them, which is why I deducted a star for durability, but i fixed it on the sewing machine. I machine wash with the diapers and hang to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: I love these diaper bags! 👶
customer_reviews.text: Updated: the zipper broke after a few months of use. I wish this had lasted longer. :( So cute and they fit so many cloth diapers. They really hold in the smell too which is super important!
customer_reviews.author: Katie O.

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and practical!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice for the price! These bags are super cute and functional. We have one in our diaper bag to take smelly diapers with us when we're visiting someone and we have one in our nursery. These bags are also really easy to keep clean. The snap close loop on the outside is also really handy to use to hang this.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy D

customer_reviews.title: Leaked the first time I used it
customer_reviews.text: These bags are awful. I bought them to hang in the bathroom next to the diaper sprayer. First time I put a sprayed diaper in it, I found a gross puddle on the floor. Terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Clay Mama

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: These are still fairly new but so far no leaks. I always get compliments on how cute these bags are and it's nice that I can use for cloth diapers or any other soiled clothes. I've got a baby that doctors call a happy spitter. She's not fussy but we change clothes frequently. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Renate M.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great for traveling. You can put a wet swim suit and towel inside and pack in your suitcase and nothing else around it gets wet. The outside stays nice and dry.
customer_reviews.author: chood

customer_reviews.title: Not cool! These were GREAT and leak proof
customer_reviews.text: They don't leak! I have had other well-known brands of wet bags that got clammy on the outside within an hour or two of holding a wet diaper. Not cool! These were GREAT and leak proof! Plus they are thin enough that they fold down really small and didn't take up a lot of space in my very full diaper bag. I love having the second pocket option for when I wanted to use this as my diaper bag for short excursions: clean in the outer, wet in the inner!
customer_reviews.author: Katie McPhee

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to toss in my diaper bag and go for cloth diapering, to the beach, or to the pool. Works well for all wet items, not just diapers! I love the two compartment set up. I also use cloth wipes so now I have place to store them for cloth diapering
customer_reviews.author: Colby

customer_reviews.title: Conveniently organizes diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this wet bag, I have two under three and one in the potty training stage. This helps me keep my diaper bag so organized! I’ve washed the bags twice now and haven’t noticed any damage to the bags. I do leave them to air dry instead of throwing them in the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: NR

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: These are great for diaper bags and my pumping bag. Does the job well. Cleans easy in washer/dryer without any shrinking or damage. Folds up nice. Has a pocket. Just wish it was a bit thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Not just for diaper use
customer_reviews.text: Only wish they were a bit larger. Using for incontinence parent using pads. Roll them up, place them in the sack and empty and rotate. Could use for children’s wet swimsuits, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Sac Reader

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great bags. I use one to carry all my pump parts in when travel. I like that I can keep the clean stuff in one pocket and the dirty in the other. The other bag I use for my daughter’s wet swim suit and towel after swimming lessons. I haven’t noticed anything leaking through as is the problem with some other brands. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel or for newborn diapers in the hospital
customer_reviews.text: I love the snap on the handle, made it easy to attach it to the diaper bag, stroller, etc. I was disappointed a bit in the size as the pictures make them seem a bit larger than what they really are. I can fit a good amount in there I just expected them to be bigger. The prints are nice and they are easy to wash
customer_reviews.author: Toni S.

customer_reviews.title: These are everything I was looking for and more
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags! Bought them for my babies' dirty clothes and wet swimsuits. I've also used them as a discreet storage solution for my breastpump parts. Adorable patterns. Small enough for travel but boasts a lot of space!
customer_reviews.author: Heather C

customer_reviews.title: Also great for storing pump parts in the fridge!
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful! I know I'll continue using them for dirty and wet clothes when I'm done using them for pump parts. I just toss them in the wash with my baby's clothes and they clean up just fine! We use dye and fragrance free detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and contains diaper smell
customer_reviews.text: These bags are perfect for the diaper bag. This bag easily fits 6+ dirty diapers. It contains the smell and doesn’t make your whole diaper bag smell. Just throw it in the wash with your cloth diapers and use again when dry.
customer_reviews.author: Sarasbananas

customer_reviews.title: Haven't tried them out yet.
customer_reviews.text: I gave three stars across the board because I don't know yet... please note they are bigger than I anticipated and seem well made though.
customer_reviews.author: C S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect swim bag!
customer_reviews.text: I use these for my swim bag as a summer camp counselor. The big zipper fits my towel, suit, and flip flops all together and keeps wet separate from dry extras I keep in the smaller zipper for afterwords. I love that I can throw it into my bag once we're done and nothing else gets wet.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Brandt

customer_reviews.title: Cute but smelly
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars because they are cute and great design with two compartments and hanging strap. However smells tend to leak through when compared to my more expensive Thirsties bag. If I set a full bag down for just a minute on my bed, that smell transfers to my bed. I typically have to hang the bag outside my door rather than in my room so it doesn't stink up my bedroom overnight. Also noticed if the two patterns I received, the mustache pattern stinks more than the other one.
customer_reviews.author: MomOf2

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I use these for cloth diapers before they're washed. They're perfect and I can throw them in the wash with the diapers. I turn them inside out and don't put them in the dryer. They've been washed probably about 20 times so far and seem like new still.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Dunne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cloth diapers
customer_reviews.text: These bags are the best for cloth diapers. Perfect for daycare. Easily fits a days worth of diapers. Then wash and send the clean one the next day. Great to have two. Dries very quickly on the line, no need for the drier. The hook is awesome too. Hangs right by the changing table for quick access.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Borkenhagen

customer_reviews.title: ... of the bags is what you would expect- a great material inside and out for wet/dry clothes and diapers
customer_reviews.text: One of the bags is what you would expect- a great material inside and out for wet/dry clothes and diapers. The other bag is a soft felt-like fabric and, although great for a sleeper, seems impractical to use for wet and dry clothes/diapers. It is not the type of material that holds up well after a few washes so I will be using it for slightly dirty clothes or strictly for clean clothes and diapers before use.
customer_reviews.author: AJD4444

customer_reviews.title: Great bags for travel out of the house
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. Only problem I had was the do not contain poop smell if you're using them for cloth diapers. It's not a strong odor but you can definitely tell
customer_reviews.author: Supergirl1080

customer_reviews.title: Really love the colors of these too!
customer_reviews.text: These little bags are so sturdy! Such a great value for the price. I love the size, they're absolutely perfect to use in the diaper bag. We cloth diaper and the babysitter can fit 5-6 cloth diapers in this bag. So that's perfect. Also I like that there are two separate zippered compartments. One for the dry clothes and one for used diapers. Or I could put the wipes in there and have diapers and wipes in one place.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

product_meta.title: ALVABABY 2pcs Cloth Diaper Wet Dry Bags Waterproof Reusable with Two Zippered Pockets Travel Beach Pool Daycare Soiled Baby Items Yoga Gym Bag for Swimsuits or Wet Clothes L0910
feature_bullets: Fashion &Stylsh, Reusable&Waterproof , High quality －A trim and attractive design. ALVABABY wet/dry bag are made from waterproof 100% polyester, put dirty cloth diapers in a wet bag. Comes with handle for easy carrying or attaching to your diaper bag or stroller.
Double Zippered － TWO Zippered compartments for keep wet and dry things separate. Each bag contains a "wet" section that is sewn and sealed for no wicking or leaking.
Enough Space－30cm x 36cm (approx.:11.5 in x 14 in)，Holds approximately 5-7 cloth diapers. Light weight, easy to carry (less than 50 g).

Multi-functional Bags－A truly wonderful bag that allows you to carry your wet and dry items in the same bag. Carry all your items in one bag while keeping your dry items dry and your wet or soiled items separate. Truly an all in one bag! They can be used as diaper wet dry bags,travel bags,storage bags,cosmetic bags,handbags,wash bags,handbags,wash bags,organizer bags.
Sincere Service&No Risk －1 year guarantee. If you have any problem with the product, please feel free to contact us, we’ll send you a new one or refund your money of your choice.

specifications.Safety warning: Wash temperature: less than 86 Fahrenheit to avoid the PUL from delaminating.Please wash diaper covers and inserts separately, please do not wash diapers together with your other clothes. You can add a little salt in the water when you wash diapers.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars1,855 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
